name: Bospop

config_properties.name: Bospop
config_properties.description: A classic rock and pop festival in Weert, Netherlands, held annually since 1981.

ai_profile:
**Bospop 2026: A Celebration of Rock and Beyond**

Bospop 2026 promises an eclectic lineup of 39 artists spanning a variety of genres, with a strong foundation in rock music. From the classic energy of Rock (15 acts) and Blues Rock (5 acts) to the edgier vibes of Alternative Rock (5 acts) and Indie Rock (4 acts), the festival embraces its rock roots while exploring diverse styles like Symphonic Metal, Funk, and even Comedy Rock. With an average rating of 8.16 from 82.1% of the lineup, this year’s edition has been highly anticipated by fans and critics alike.

The festival’s lineup reflects a mix of local and international talent, with artists hailing from 10 different countries. The USA, the Netherlands, and the UK lead the charge, contributing 22 acts in total, while Belgium, Canada, and Australia add their unique flavors to the roster. Though male artists dominate the lineup (27), efforts to include female (5), mixed-gender (1), and unknown-gender acts (5) hint at a step toward greater diversity. Additionally, 4 artists are identified as people of color, though much remains unknown regarding the full representation.

While none of the artists have Spotify links available, Bospop 2026 offers a rich and multifaceted experience for music lovers, showcasing a blend of established names and emerging talents. With a lineup that spans genres, generations, and geographies, the festival continues its legacy as a celebration of musical diversity and creativity. Whether you’re a fan of soulful Blues or high-energy Metal, this year’s Bospop is set to deliver something for everyone.
